About Me

Dimas Putra Wijaya

Unique Skill

Full-stack development with cyber-security focus

Philosophy

KISS principle + OWASP Top 10 security

I'm a passionate college student on the road to becoming a Full-Stack Web Engineer and Cyber Security Expert. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies, I create robust and secure web applications.

I follow the KISS principle (Keep It Simple, Stupid) and am mindful of OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities to ensure the security of my applications.

My journey in tech is driven by curiosity and the desire to solve real-world problems through secure, elegant code and innovative solutions.

What I Bring to You:

  • Secure, efficient, and maintainable code
  • Full-stack development with security-first approach
  • Continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies

My Projects

Here are some projects I've worked on recently and some that are coming soon.

Snake Game

Classic Snake game implemented in Python using tkinter library. Features include score tracking, collision detection, When the snake eats food, it grows longer.

Python Pygame Game Dev OOP
GitHub

Password Generator

A secure password generator tool that creates random passwords based on keyboard symbols. Features include customizable length, character sets, and secure randomization algorithm. but the UI is still ugly

JavaScript HTML CSS Security
GitHub

AI-Powered SOC Dashboard

Advanced Security Operations Center dashboard integrating AI for intelligent threat detection. Features include Intrusion Detection Systems (IDS), Threat Intelligence feeds, Honeypot integration, SIEM correlation, and SOAR automation for comprehensive cybersecurity monitoring and response.

AI/ML CyberSec SIEM Threat Intel
Coming Soon

E-Commerce Web Scraper Bot

Automated bot for scraping e-commerce websites to collect product data, prices, and inventory information. Features include data extraction, storage in PostgreSQL database, and scheduled scraping intervals.

Python Web Scraping PostgreSQL Automation
Coming Soon

SaaS InvoiceFlow Project

Smart invoice and payment tracking system with automated reminders, multi-currency support, and comprehensive financial reporting. Features include invoice generation, payment tracking, and client management.
